author: Adam Shaw
title: Trump hints at cutting WHO funding over coronavirus handling, says they ‘really blew it’
description: President Trump suggested Tuesday that he might consider cutting funding for the World Health Organization over its handling of the coronavirus crisis and alleged role in helping China downplay the severity of the outbreak.
content:
